steps: Navigate to Settings > Leave > Leave Policies
Edit Leave Policy and toggle 'Leave Salary Settings'
Go to Payroll Settings and select 'Leave Salary Policy'
Define Policy Name and add Policy Description
Select applicable leave types
Configure salary calculation method and allowance components
Select eligible employees and apply probation restrictions if any
Review and save the policy
what_to_do.expected_outcome: Leave salary policy is configured with correct parameters, eligible employees assigned, and policy is active from the activation date.

steps: Navigate to Finance > Leave Salary
Review pending leave salary requests and check eligibility
Approve or reject requests
Optionally overwrite approved amounts before final approval
Add approved amounts to payroll table
Process leave salary transactions
what_to_do.expected_outcome: Leave salary requests are reviewed, approved or rejected correctly, and approved amounts are reflected in payroll.

steps: Determine leave period and choose salary payment month
Calculate prorated salary applying working day settings
Exclude non-applicable allowances from calculation
Update payroll table with leave salary transactions
Add transaction remarks as needed
Generate Variable Pay File (VPF)
what_to_do.expected_outcome: Leave salary transactions are accurately calculated, processed, and integrated into payroll with proper documentation.

what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: The report lacks flexible sorting, precise formatting, and comprehensive employee data fields. It is generated on-the-go, restricting real-time customization.
what_to_watch_out_for.workaround: No effective workaround; users must accept current report constraints or request development work.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Currency label mismatch on Leave Salary landing page
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: The landing page currency label is static and does not adapt to the company's configured currency.
what_to_watch_out_for.workaround: Users must manually interpret the currency; actual leave salary requests use correct currency.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Leave Salary policy assignment timing affects eligibility
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: No support for retroactive leave salary policy assignments; eligibility is fixed at request creation time.
what_to_watch_out_for.workaround: Ensure policies are assigned before leave requests are created.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Multiple leave requests for leaves spanning multiple cycles
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: System does not consolidate leave salary requests across leave cycles; separate approvals required.
what_to_watch_out_for.workaround: Manually track and approve each request separately.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Lack of month-specific leave salary breakdown
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: No display of leave salary allocation by month for multi-month leaves; only aggregate days shown.
what_to_watch_out_for.workaround: Users must manually calculate or estimate month-wise allocation.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Leave Salary Accrual calculation affected by working day settings
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: Daily wage calculator's working day setting causes monthly fluctuations in accrual calculations.
what_to_watch_out_for.workaround: Configure working day settings carefully to minimize fluctuations.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Inconsistent leave salary report downloads for individual staff
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: Cannot directly download leave salary reports for specific staff members via standard interface.
what_to_watch_out_for.workaround: Use manual report downloads via Payroll table reports.

what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: Lack of clear guidance on salary components and restrictions during leave salary encashment.
what_to_watch_out_for.workaround: Users must refer to external documentation or support for configuration clarity.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Incomplete payroll templates missing leave salary details
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: Payroll templates lack absent days count and detailed leave salary policy breakdown.
what_to_watch_out_for.workaround: Manual reconciliation required outside the system.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Leave salary requests not raised for cross-cycle leaves
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: Cannot process leave salary requests starting before current payroll cycle start date.
what_to_watch_out_for.workaround: Manually split leave requests to fit payroll cycles.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Data synchronization issues between leave approval and payroll queue
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: Not all approved leaves propagate automatically to leave salary queue for payroll processing.
what_to_watch_out_for.workaround: Manual verification and intervention required to ensure payroll queue accuracy.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: No automated notifications for payroll managers on leave salary policy setup
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: Payroll managers are not automatically notified when leave salary enabled policies are configured.
what_to_watch_out_for.workaround: Manual communication needed between HR and payroll teams.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Lack of comprehensive end-to-end tests for leave salary request generation
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: No full frontend test coverage for leave salary request workflows.
what_to_watch_out_for.workaround: Testing must be done manually or via partial automated tests.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Missing technical documentation for leave salary calculations
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: No comprehensive internal documentation explaining leave salary calculation rules.
what_to_watch_out_for.workaround: Users rely on support or informal documentation.

what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: Users cannot filter payroll data by leave salary in current payroll table interface.
what_to_watch_out_for.workaround: Manual filtering or external report extraction required.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Leave Salary page lacks leave encashment request management
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: Users cannot create or manage leave encashment requests within leave salary interface.
what_to_watch_out_for.workaround: Separate processes or manual tracking needed for leave encashment.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: User confusion on leave salary transaction posting workflow
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: Lack of intuitive guidance for posting leave salary transactions despite existing filtering functionality.
what_to_watch_out_for.workaround: Users must rely on training or support for transaction posting.
